title: Add Dark Mode Support
description: Users often work late at night or in low-light environments. A dark mode can significantly reduce eye strain and improve user experience. It would be ideal if users could toggle dark mode on/off and have the setting persist across sessions.
name: Jane Doe

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Security is a top priority, especially for users handling sensitive data. Adding two-factor authentication (2FA) via SMS or authentication apps would enhance security and build trust with users who expect modern safety features.
name: John Smith

title: Offline Mode
description: In areas with unreliable internet, users should be able to access core features of the app. Offline mode would allow them to continue working and sync data automatically once a connection is restored.
name: Alice Nguyen

title: Custom Notifications
description: Users should have the ability to configure notifications, such as choosing which types of alerts they want to receive and setting notification quiet hours. This allows for a more personalized and less intrusive experience.
name: Carlos Rivera

title: Multi-language Support
description: Expanding to a global user base requires multi-language support. Initially targeting Spanish, French, and German would cover many users. The UI text, help content, and notifications should be translatable.
name: Emma Müller

title: Export Data to CSV
description: Many users need to analyze their data externally or share it with stakeholders. Providing an export-to-CSV function would be useful for reports, backups, or integrations with other tools.
name: Liam O'Connor

title: Integration with Google Calendar
description: Syncing with Google Calendar allows users to view and manage events in one place. This would streamline planning, avoid scheduling conflicts, and help teams coordinate better.
name: Sophia Lee

title: Bulk Edit Feature
description: Managing large sets of data can be time-consuming. A bulk edit tool would let users select multiple items and apply changes at once—such as assigning tags, changing statuses, or deleting entries.
name: Noah Johnson

title: Drag and Drop Interface
description: A drag-and-drop interface would enhance user experience by allowing users to reorder tasks, move items between sections, or organize workflows visually without needing to use buttons or menus.
name: Olivia Brown

title: Form Validation Bug
description: There is a bug in the form validation where the submit button stays disabled even when all fields are correctly filled out. This issue is blocking users from completing forms and needs urgent attention.
name: William Zhang
